channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国人大将于下周推出更多刺激措施，但不太可能进行大胆改革
item.description: China's parliament is expected to unveil moderate stimulus plans to stabilise growth at an annual meeting beginning on Tuesday, but may disappoint those calling for a detailed roadmap of bold policies to fix the country's deep structural imbalances.翻译:预计中国人大将在周二开始的年度会议上公布温和的刺激计划，以稳定增长，但可能会让那些呼吁制定大胆政策详细路线图以解决该国深度结构性失衡的人失望。
item.author: Kevin Yao

item.title: 价格战升级 特斯拉在华推出新激励措施
item.description: Tesla unveiled new incentives, including insurance subsidies, on Friday to woo consumers in the world's largest auto market, where the U.S. electric vehicle giant is in a protracted price war against entrenched rivals such as BYD.翻译:特斯拉周五推出了包括保险补贴在内的新激励措施，以吸引全球最大汽车市场的消费者，这家美国电动汽车巨头正在与比亚迪等根深蒂固的竞争对手进行旷日持久的价格战。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 恒大董事长第二座被扣押的香港豪宅挂牌出售
item.description: A second mansion in Hong Kong that once belonged to China Evergrande Group's chairman has been put up for sale by its receivers, according to property agent Savills.翻译:据房地产经纪人第一太平戴维斯称，曾经属于中国恒大集团董事长的香港第二座豪宅已被接管人挂牌出售。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着中国和日本的步履蹒跚，亚洲工厂为增长而苦苦挣扎
item.description: Asia's major manufacturing economies struggled to claw their way out of decline in February with Japan particularly squeezed by a steeper fall in demand while an uneven recovery in China overshadowed some signs of improvement elsewhere in the region.翻译:2月份，亚洲主要制造业经济体艰难摆脱衰退，其中日本尤其受到需求急剧下降的挤压，而中国复苏的不平衡掩盖了该地区其他地区的一些改善迹象。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着中国收紧就职前的挤压，台湾面临持续的“滴水”压力
item.description: Taiwan is facing a steady "drip, drip" of Chinese pressure ahead of the inauguration of its next president in May, with officials in Taipei fearing Beijing could further squeeze the island's room to manoeuvre without resorting to direct conflict.翻译:在下一任总统五月就职之前，台湾正面临着来自中国的持续“滴滴”压力，台北官员担心北京可能会在不诉诸直接冲突的情况下进一步挤压台湾的回旋余地。
item.author: Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard

item.title: 华尔街反弹，日本、澳大利亚股市创历史新高
item.description: Japanese and Australian shares hit fresh record highs on Friday as a key U.S. inflation reading came in as expected, a relief for investors that had looked for a June rate cut, while mixed data from China bolstered hopes for more policy support.翻译:日本和澳大利亚股市周五创下历史新高，因美国关键通胀数据如期公布，让原本期待六月降息的投资者松了一口气，而中国好坏参半的数据则提振了人们对更多政策支持的希望。
item.author: Stella Qiu

item.title: 中国工厂活动连续五个月萎缩，加大刺激力度
item.description: China's manufacturing activity in February shrank for a fifth straight month, an official survey showed on Friday, raising pressure on Beijing to roll out more stimulus measures as the parliament prepares for a key annual meeting next week.翻译:周五的一项官方调查显示，中国2月份制造业活动连续第五个月萎缩，在人大准备下周举行的重要年度会议之际，加大了北京方面推出更多刺激措施的压力。
item.author: Ellen Zhang, Joe Cash

item.title: 交易员权衡美联储降息押注，美元持稳；日元兑 150/dlr 走势不稳定
item.description: The dollar was steady on Friday after data showed U.S. inflation remained sticky but is easing gradually, keeping hopes alive that the Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates in June, while the yen stumbled back to the key 150 per dollar level.翻译:周五数据显示美国通胀仍然粘性但正在逐步放缓，这让人们对美联储将在 6 月开始降息的希望依然存在，而日元则跌回 150 兑美元的关键水平，周五美元保持稳定。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 澳大利亚 Syrah Resources 与韩国 Posco Future M 签署承购协议
item.description: Australia's Syrah Resources said on Friday it will supply natural graphite product from its Balama graphite operations in Mozambique to South Korean chemical and battery material maker Posco Future M .翻译:澳大利亚Syrah Resources周五表示，将向韩国化学和电池材料制造商Posco Future M供应莫桑比克Balama石墨业务的天然石墨产品。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：市场活跃，但中国 PMI 等待公布
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 中国房价今年可能下跌0.9%；之前的民意调查显示增长：路透社​​民意调查
item.description: New home prices in China are likely to fall this year due to limited effect of ongoing government support measures, a Reuters poll showed, with economists predicting the ailing market will need more than a year to bottom out.翻译:路透调查显示，由于政府持续支持措施的效果有限，今年中国的新房价格可能会下跌，经济学家预测，疲软的市场需要一年多的时间才能触底。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo

item.title: 向俄罗斯走私军事技术的俄罗斯男子在美国法庭认罪
item.description: A Russian man pled guilty on Thursday to U.S. charges that he smuggled large quantities of American-made, military-grade microelectronics to Russia, top U.S. justice officials said in a statement.翻译:美国高级司法官员在一份声明中表示，一名俄罗斯男子周四承认美国指控他向俄罗斯走私大量美国制造的军用级微电子产品。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 波音公司同意就美国出口违规行为（包括在中国）达成 5100 万美元和解协议
item.description: Boeing said on Thursday it had reached a $51 million settlement with the U.S. State Department for numerous export violations including Chinese employees in China improperly downloading documents related to U.S. Defense Department programs.翻译:波音公司周四表示，已与美国国务院就多项出口违规行为达成了 5100 万美元的和解，其中包括在华中国员工不当下载与美国国防部项目相关的文件。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 美国贸易主管：世贸组织谈判需要“复杂的权衡”
item.description: U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai said on Friday breakthroughs were still possible in overnight negotiations at the World Trade Organization, but "complex trade-offs" would be needed even for less difficult topics such as fishing.翻译:美国贸易代表戴凯瑟琳周五表示，世界贸易组织隔夜谈判仍有可能取得突破，但即使对于渔业等不太困难的话题也需要“复杂的权衡”。
item.author: Emma Farge

item.title: 2023年中国电动汽车对外投资可能创下新纪录
item.description: Chinese outbound foreign direct investment along the electric vehicle value chain likely set a new record in 2023, a report from Rhodium Group showed, as western economies step up scrutiny of China's production-focussed, debt driven development model.翻译:荣鼎集团的一份报告显示，随着西方经济体加强对中国以生产为中心、债务驱动的发展模式的审查，中国电动汽车价值链上的对外直接投资可能会在 2023 年创下新纪录。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 斐济称世贸组织的渔业协议不足以保护太平洋岛屿
item.description: A grouping of Pacific islands, including Fiji, Papua New Guinea and the Solomon Islands, are opposing a draft deal on changes to fisheries subsidies at the World Trade Organization talks in Abu Dhabi, arguing that it does not go far enough.翻译:包括斐济、巴布亚新几内亚和所罗门群岛在内的一些太平洋岛屿反对在阿布扎比举行的世界贸易组织谈判中提出的一项关于改变渔业补贴的协议草案，认为该草案做得还不够。
item.author: Alexander Cornwell

item.title: 中国零售商进一步打折 iPhone 15
item.description: Major Chinese third-party retailers JD.com , TMall, and Pinduoduo are battling for customers by offering more steep discounts on Apple's iPhone 15 just five months after launch, as the U.S. tech company suffers slowing sales in China.翻译:由于苹果公司的 iPhone 15 在中国的销售放缓，中国主要第三方零售商京东、天猫和拼多多在 iPhone 15 上市仅五个月后就提供了更大的折扣，以争夺客户。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh

item.title: 德国希望大型科技公司支付新数字法的合规成本
item.description: Germany wants Big Tech companies Alphabet , Amazon , Apple , ByteDance, Meta Platforms and Microsoft to contribute towards the compliance costs of new European Union rules aimed at curbing their power, a senior German economy ministry official said on Thursday.翻译:德国经济部一位高级官员周四表示，德国希望大型科技公司 Alphabet、亚马逊、苹果、字节跳动、Meta Platform 和微软为旨在限制其权力的欧盟新规则的合规成本做出贡献。
item.author: Foo Yun Chee

item.title: 早盘买盘：随着个人消费支出通胀迫在眉睫，日元在闰日上涨
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国将调查中国汽车是否构成国家数据安全风险
item.description: The United States is opening an investigation into whether Chinese vehicle imports pose national security risks and could impose restrictions due to concerns about "connected" car technology, the White House said on Thursday.翻译:白宫周四表示，美国正在对中国汽车进口是否构成国家安全风险展开调查，并可能因对“联网”汽车技术的担忧而实施限制。
item.author: David Shepardson
